content:
Sure, here's a list of the documents required to commercialize the Fresh Earth ecosystem globally, grouped into the following categories:

1. Technology Development
* Technical specifications and architecture design
* Code repository and version control system
* Development timeline and milestones
* Testing and quality assurance plan
* Security and data privacy plan
* Patent and intellectual property documentation
2. Marketing and Communications
* Product and market positioning
* Branding and visual identity guidelines
* Go-to-market strategy and plan
* Content and social media plan
* Event and partnership plan
* Public relations and media outreach plan
3. Investment documentation
* Business plan and financial model
* Investor pitch deck
* Token economics and whitepaper
* Token issuance plan and terms
* Legal and regulatory compliance plan
* Token sale agreement and investor terms
4. Other
* Project management plan
* Governance and decision-making structure
* Legal, financial and administrative documents
* Recruitment and staffing plan
* Operations and maintenance plan
* Customer service and support plan

Please let me know if there are any other categories that should be included in this list.
